overview: When some of her buxom co-workers vanish, exotic dancer Julie Baxter believes their disappearances -- and subsequent deaths -- may be the work of a psychotic killer â€¦ and that she could be next. With no help from her abusive boyfriend or the cocky police, Julie turns to private detective Kyle Reilly for help in this direct-to-video erotic thriller.
tagline: A serial killer is out to clean the streets of all sinners
title: Sinful Deeds
